title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Field Trips
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips                Plan A Field Trip       To schedule a field trip to one or more of the Flagstaff Area National Monuments-Sunset Crater Volcano, Wupatki or Walnut Canyon, please complete the registration forms one month in advance of your trip. Being prepared will help you and your students get the most out of your visit to the Flagstaff Monuments. Click here for a one-stop Teacher Fact Sheet (pdf) that will help in your planning process.  Educational Fee Waivers:  If you would like to see if your group qualifies for an Educational Fee Waive,please click here.     Apply for an educational fee waiver.
